email_body: wish you guys were going a week earlier. i'm going next weekend. too much vegas is bad for the soul....and the wallet. Jennifer Shipos 12/27/2000 04:28 PM To: John.arnold@enron.com cc: Subject: Vegas Come to Vegas with us. (Jan 12-14) If you are going to spend a fortune on your painting, you should at least see it one more time before you buy it. What do you think?
